title: Germany Banking Giant DZ to Pilot Crypto Trading This Year: Bloomberg
description: The bank released a cryptocurrency custody platform in November.

title: 19.4% Bitcoin portfolio allocation ideal for risk-adjusted returns: ARK Invest
description:
ARK Invest’s annual research report suggests that institutional portfolios aiming for maximized risk-adjusted returns should have allocated 19.4% to Bitcoin in 2023.

A 2023 research report from ARK Invest highlights Bitcoin’s historical outperformance of major assets and suggests an institutional portfolio allocation as high as 19.4% to maximize risk-adjusted returns.

The investment management firm published its annual report on Jan. 31, which presents various research findings focused on technological convergence of blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, energy storage and robotics.

Related: Bitcoin is now a ‘public good’ — ARK Invest president

Read more

description:

title: January’s Digital Asset Surge:  CCData Reveals the Impact of the Launch of Spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S.
description: CCData is an FCA-authorised benchmark administrator and a global leader in digital asset data, providing institutional-grade digital asset data and settlement indices. title: USDC to Go Native on Celo Blockchain, Eyeing Role as Gas Currency
description: The Celo Foundation has partnered with Circle to bring USDC, a leading stablecoin, into its network. This integration not only diversifies Celo’s stablecoin offerings but also positions USDC to become an official gas currency on the blockchain. title: Cornell University Launches First Bitcoin-Focused Degree
description:

This initiative aimed at knitting together a worldwide network of students passionate about Bitcoin. title: Top 5 Crypto Exchange KuCoin Lists Gaming-focused Project MixMob (MXM)
description:
KuCoin proclaims support for gaming-focused crypto project MixMob (MXM). MXM tokens can now be deposited on KuCoin, with trading commencing on Feb 1. Previously, KuCoin listed Shrapnel’s SHRAP token, a similar gaming crypto project. title: Binance Customers Can Now Use External Custodians For Their Assets
description:
Binance has begun to allow some traders to keep their assets at independent banks. Customers demanded external custody following Binance’s recent regulatory challenges. Some Binance customers have reportedly subscribed to Switzerland’s Sygnum Bank and Flow Bank. Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by volume, has begun to allow some traders to keep their assets at […]
